data.message: MCP Memory/Vector Server Landscape 2025-2026: 1) Qdrant MCP Server (official) - uses FastEmbed with all-MiniLM-L6-v2, supports stdio/SSE transports, provides qdrant-store/qdrant-find tools. 2) mcp-qdrant-memory - knowledge graph + semantic search combined. 3) Memory frameworks: Mem0 (SaaS, mature), Cognee (graph+vector, 0.93 accuracy), Zep (session-based), Letta (archival memory, open source). 4) Anydb-mcp provides universal database support (PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, Redis, SQLite) via standard connection URIs.
